Articles.Content:
When "warp here" function is used, game displays "/ to cancel time warp" but this does not work for me. I have non-u.s keyboard (fi), slash is typed with shift+7 or from numpad and neither cancels timewarp. The , key does cancel time warp.

Not exactly a question but I didn't know where else to post it..
same here for german keyboard (shift+7). had to realign it.
They bind the keys to physical locations of keys on the UK/US layout.  The key you need will be where the slash is on UK boards. It's on the bottom row next to ,.

On 19.10.2016 at 0:53 PM, Torih said:

They bind the keys to physical locations of keys on the UK/US layout.  The key you need will be where the slash is on UK boards. It's on the bottom row next to ,. 

Doesn't actually work (that's what I tried right away).
